{{Actor| | type = Armor | name = Platinum helm | class = PlatinumHelm | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8007 | spawnid = 70 | spawnname = T_PLATINUMHELM }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Armor|Armor]]→[[Classes:HexenArmor|HexenArmor]]→PlatinumHelm
The Platinum Helm looks just like the helm worn by [[Classes:FighterPlayer|Baratus]] and [[Classes:FighterBoss|Zedek]]: a typical fantasy helm, open-faced and with a noseguard and horns. It increases a Hexen player class's Armor Class by a certain amount: * +3 for Baratus the Fighter * +2 for Daedolon the Mage * +1 for Parias the Cleric In Hexen, it is designed to be used with the [[Classes:AmuletOfWarding|Amulet of Warding]], [[Classes:FalconShield|Falcon Shield]] and [[Classes:MeshArmor|Mesh Armor]], but if imported in another game only one piece of [[Classes:HexenArmor|Hexen Armor]] can be used at a time. In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named ARM3A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PlatinumHelm : {{Class|HexenArmor}} { +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} {{Property|Health}} 2 // Armor class {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 0 {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARMOR3" // "PLATINUM HELMET" States { Spawn: AR_3 A -1 Stop } } ==Related Classes== [[Classes:ArtiBoostArmor|ArtiBoostArmor]], called in-game the Dragonskin Bracers, enhance a character's Hexen Armor class.
